1.caption_en:
Caption: A circular "platform value network" diagram divided into four stakeholder quadrants labeled Consumers, Producers, Partners, and Owners, with concentric inner rings marked "CORE VALUE" and "MISSION" and a horizontal band labeled "VALUE PROPOSITIONS" and "TRANSACTIONS." The layout uses colored ring segments and simple icons (people, factory, link, owners) in a stylized gear-like background.

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "title": "Platform Value Network (region)",
  "layout": "concentric_circles_with_quadrants",
  "stakeholder_quadrants": [
    "CONSUMERS",
    "PRODUCERS",
    "PARTNERS",
    "OWNERS"
  ],
  "inner_labels": [
    "CORE VALUE",
    "MISSION"
  ],
  "section_labels": [
    "VALUE PROPOSITIONS",
    "TRANSACTIONS"
  ],
  "icons": {
    "CONSUMERS": "group_avatar",
    "PRODUCERS": "factory",
    "PARTNERS": "chain_link",
    "OWNERS": "group_business_people"
  },
  "colors": {
    "ring_segments_ordered": [
      "red",
      "green",
      "yellow",
      "teal"
    ],
    "background_grey": "#e6e6e6",
    "central_background": "white"
  },
  "visual_notes": "Stylized gear-like outer ring, quadrant dividers like crosshairs, central white space for core value/mission; simple monochrome icons in each quadrant.",
  "ocr_text_detected": [
    "CONSUMERS",
    "PRODUCERS",
    "CORE VALUE",
    "VALUE PROPOSITIONS",
    "TRANSACTIONS",
    "MISSION",
    "PARTNERS",
    "OWNERS"
  ]
}
